column4: "savory smell of stew filled Tyrion's nostrils. He dragged himself over to where his man Morrec"
"to where his man Morrec was tending the stewpot. Wordlessly; Morrec handed him the ladle. Tyrion"
"handed him the ladle. Tyrion tasted and handed it back. "More pepper;" he said.  Benjen"
"far north;" the Lord Commander told him as they drank.  "I have Jyck and Morrec"
"north;" the Lord Commander told him as they drank.  "I have Jyck and Morrec;" Tyrion"
"Commander told him as they drank.  "I have Jyck and Morrec;" Tyrion said; "and Yoren"
"A dagger at his belt; and two men. Jyck swung a fair enough sword; but Morrec"
"grazing on clumps of brown grass that grew from clefts in the rock. Jyck and Morrec"
"Marillion sat frozen; clutching his woodharp; his face as pale as milk; but Tyrion's man Morrec"
"bounded quickly to his feet and moved to help the knight with his armor.  Tyrion"
"away. Ser Rodrik tossed Jyck his sword and scabbard; and wheeled to meet the foe. Morrec"
"away. Ser Rodrik tossed Jyck his sword and scabbard; and wheeled to meet the foe. Morrec"
"I am not practiced at starting fires. Morrec did that for me."  "A fire?" Bronn"
"blood was actually shed; although it was a close thing once or twice. Morrec and Jyck"
